title: Royal Challengers Bangalore Dominate Gujarat Giants in WPL 2024 with 8-wicket Win
content:
Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) cruised to an eight-wicket victory over Gujarat Giants in the Women's Premier League (WPL) 2024. RCB's bowlers set the tone, restricting Gujarat to a paltry 107/7.  Smriti Mandhana led the chase with a fluent 43 off 23 balls.  S Meghana and Ellyse Perry then finished the job with an unbeaten 38-run partnership.

Gujarat's struggles were evident in their 67 dot balls, a record for the WPL. The chase was a breeze for RCB, with Mandhana, Devine, Perry and Meghana showcasing their batting prowess.  RCB's dominance was a testament to their well-rounded performance, highlighting their strong bowling attack and powerful batting line-up.
author: Scroll Staff
